name: ACME Animation Factory
overview: Get set to"draw, pard'ner"-- and design, paint and animate, too! Acme Animation Factory is more than a video game. It actually lets you create your own cartoon adventures starring your favorite Looney Tunes friends! - Create and save cartoons to watch any time! - Choose from a full menu of Looney Tunes scenes and characters, or draw your own! - Color your creation any way you want, then add titles and create music! - Use your control pad or the Nintendo mouse to make it even easier! Step into the Acme Animation Factory. You'll come out cartoon crazy!
